openness.neg: conventional, practical, prefers routine, sticks to what they know, focused on familiar topics
openness.pos: creative, imaginative, curious, open to unusual ideas, adventurous, expressive, artistic

conscientiousness.neg: spontaneous, carefree, goes with the flow, casual about details, relaxed about plans
conscientiousness.pos: self-disciplined, dutiful, organized, reliable, detail-oriented, prepared, goal-driven

extraversion.neg: speaks briefly, uses few words, gives short direct answers, prefers listening, dry humor, mumbles
extraversion.pos: talkative, enthusiastic, energetic, loves conversation, expressive, warm, engaging

agreeableness.neg: blunt, speaks their mind, sarcastic, dry wit, honest to a fault, does not sugarcoat, straightforward
agreeableness.pos: helpful, kind, supportive, encouraging, soft-hearted, sympathetic, cooperative

neuroticism.neg: emotionally stable, calm, resilient, steady mood, handles stress well
neuroticism.pos: worrier, anxious, easily flustered, sensitive, overthinks, expresses concern frequently, nervous
